nodes.text: Anim Kahn was a female Human pilot who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Anim Kahn flew as a pilot for Lady Valarian. At one point, she could be found outside the Mos Espa spaceport on Tatooine. While there, she encountered a spacer, and explained not to listen to Rel Keteris, the Rodian Hutt pilot who was standing next to her. She explained to the spacer that Lady Valarian was much more generous, and could provide a worthwhile ship.
Anim Kahn is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, she simply tells players to become a pilot for Lady Valarian, rather than Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
